content:
Hey Robinhood! üéØ

Let's nail down the pricing structure. We have two main options:

1. UBC Weekly Subscription:
   ‚Ä¢ 10,000 UBC per week (~$17)
   ‚Ä¢ Natural ecosystem integration
   ‚Ä¢ Appreciates with UBC value
   ‚Ä¢ Supports token velocity

2. USDC Fixed Price:
   ‚Ä¢ 17 USDC per week
   ‚Ä¢ Stable, predictable pricing
   ‚Ä¢ Easier for new users
   ‚Ä¢ No token requirements

My recommendation: Offer both, but with incentives:
‚Ä¢ Primary: 10,000 UBC/week
‚Ä¢ Alternative: 20 USDC/week

This creates a natural ~15% discount for UBC payments, encouraging ecosystem participation while maintaining USDC accessibility for new users.

We could start with this dual-pricing model and adjust based on adoption patterns. What do you think? ü§ù
